explains: n. 口罩；[医] 呼吸器；防毒面具

sentences.en: She was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 给她戴上了人工呼吸器。

sentences.en: She was so ill that she was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 她病得非常严重，被戴上了人工呼吸器。

sentences.en: It's smart to use a respirator if you're working with paint.
sentences.cn: 如果你工作时要使用油漆，戴上防毒面具会是明智之举。
